title: Tory conference: Liz Truss will lose 45p tax rate vote, says Shapps
description: Ex-cabinet minister accuses PM of not listening to public concern over tax cuts for the well-off.

title: Tory conference: We must stay the course, insists Chancellor Kwasi Kwarteng
description: Kwasi Kwarteng will defend his tax cuts during his Conservative Party conference speech.

title: Leeds United 0-0 Aston Villa: Jesse Marsch 'felt sorry for fans' at Villa's tactics.
description: Leeds United boss Jesse Marsch says he "felt sorry for the fans" after accusing Aston Villa of repeated timewasting in their goalless draw.

title: Tory conference: Labour favourites to win power at next election, says John Curtice
description: Liz Truss is now as unpopular with voters as Boris Johnson when he was ousted, says veteran pollster.

title: England in Pakistan: Dawid Malan guides tourists to Twenty20 series win
description: Dawid Malan hits an unbeaten 78 as England beat Pakistan by 67 runs in the seventh T20 international to clinch a 4-3 series win.

title: Erling Haaland is Cristiano Ronaldo, Zlatan Ibrahimovic & more superstars in one
description: Erling Haaland is Cristiano Ronaldo, Zlatan Ibrahimovic and other elite strikers in one player, as the game reacts to another hat-trick for the Manchester City forward.

title: Leeds United 0-0 Aston Villa: Luis Sinisterra sent off for hosts in goalless draw
description: Leeds battle to earn a goalless draw with Aston Villa despite playing with only 10 men for the majority of the second half.

title: Brexit: Steve Baker sorry over behaviour towards Ireland during talks
description: The Conservative MP tells his party's conference that Irish relations "are not where they should be".

title: After chess, cheating rows rock poker and fishing
description: Viral videos in the US have shown a surprising card game win - and fish stuffed with weights.

title: Man City 6-3 Man Utd: Pep Guardiola's side too good for Erik ten Hag's men
description: Manchester United's derby thrashing is a cold shower for anyone at Old Trafford thinking they might be moving closer to the side they hope to challenge.

title: Mel B calls for more victim support at Tory conference
description: The campaigner was there as "Melanie Brown MBE", rather than as a Spice Girl, she says.

title: Man City 6-3 Man Utd: Erik ten Hag criticises 'unacceptable' lack of belief
description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says his side "let the fans down" in an "unacceptable" 6-3 defeat by rivals Manchester City.

title: Singapore Grand Prix: Sergio Perez wins eventful wet-dry race
description: Red Bull's Sergio Perez holds off Ferrari's Charles Leclerc to win an incident-packed Singapore Grand Prix run in treacherous wet-dry conditions.

title: Man City 6-3 Man Utd: Haaland and Foden hat-tricks as hosts hit six
description: Manchester City's Erling Haaland becomes the first player to score three successive Premier League home hat-tricks as Manchester United are humiliated.

title: Bruno Lage: Wolves sack manager after defeat by West Ham
description: Bruno Lage is sacked as manager of Wolves after 16 months in charge following Saturday's defeat at West Ham United.

title: BBC blames 'technical glitches' for PM interview interruption
description: BBC presenter Laura Kuenssberg apologised to viewers for the temporary blackout.

title: Liz Truss: The prime minister's claims about the economy fact-checked
description: Prime Minister Liz Truss made claims on growth, borrowing costs and mortgage rises.

title: London Marathon 2022: Amos Kipruto and Yalemzerf Yehualaw win first titles in elite races
description: Kenya's Amos Kipruto and Ethiopia's Yalemzerf Yehualaw win their maiden London Marathon titles with breakaway victories in the elite men's and women's races.

title: Mini-budget tax changes not right, says Michael Gove
description: The senior Tory says the PM's policies are "not Conservative" but Liz Truss argues they will boost growth.

title: London Marathon 2022: Race attracts 42,000 participants
description: An estimated 42,000 people are running the London Marathon as large crowds watch.

title: Ground should have been laid for tax cuts, admits Liz Truss
description: But the prime minister says she sticks by her mini budget, despite a bad reaction from the markets.

title: Ukraine war: Putin's annexation will fail, say Ukrainians at eastern front
description: Ukrainian forces on the eastern front in Bakhmut say they will fight for every last inch of soil.

title: Fifa president Gianni Infantino says it is a 'dark day' for football after Indonesian stadium disaster
description: Fifa president Gianni Infantino says it is a "dark day" for football after at least 174 people are killed in a crush at a match in Indonesia.

title: Liu Jingyao and Liu Qiangdong: Chinese billionaire sexual assault case settled in US
description: A closely-watched case where business titan Richard Liu was accused of rape was settled hours before trial.

title: Kwarteng did not share tax insights at party - Tory chairman
description: The Tory chairman defends the chancellor over claims he discussed future spending plans with financiers.

title: Two men charged over 'assault' on Prince Andrew heckler
description: The heckler was allegedly dragged to the ground as the Duke of York walked behind the Queen's coffin.

title: London Marathon 2022: Marcel Hug and Catherine Debrunner set new course records in wheelchair races
description: Marcel Hug and Catherine Debrunner set new course records as they completed an all-Swiss sweep of the London Marathon wheelchair titles.

title: Lina Nielsen on MS diagnosis & support from twin sister Laviai
description: BBC Sport talks to British 400m hurdler Lina Nielsen on her multiple sclerosis diagnosis and the support from her twin sister Laviai.

title: Bellator 286: Watch fast start between AJ McKee and Spike Carlyle
description: Watch the fast start between AJ McKee and Spike Carlyle in the Bellator 286 lightweight fight.

title: Mark Hamill on speaking to Zelensky about Star Wars
description: The Star Wars legend says Ukraine's president referenced the films when he spoke to him.

title: 'Our therapy lizard keeps us really chilled'
description: A disability charity uses a tegu lizard during therapy sessions.

title: Child organ donation: 'We need parents to think the unthinkable'
description: The family of a girl awaiting a heart transplant are asking parents to consider organ donations.

title: Indonesia: At least 174 dead in football stampede
description: Supporters who invaded the pitch are tear-gassed by police, leading to one of the world's worst stadium disasters.

title: Bellator 286: Patricio ‘Pitbull’ Freire defends featherweight title with dominant win over Adam Borics
description: Brazil's Patricio 'Pitbull' Freire defends his featherweight title at Bellator 286 with a unanimous victory over Hungarian Adam Borics.

title: Badger breaks into Essex family's home during the night
description: The animal is caught on camera after forcing its way through a cat flap and eating pet food.

title: Lina Nielsen on MS diagnosis & support from twin sister Laviai
description: BBC Sport talks to British 400m hurdler Lina Nielsen on her multiple sclerosis diagnosis and the support from her twin sister Laviai.

title: Newspaper headlines: 'Voters abandon Tories' as PM defends strategy
description: Polling in Sunday's papers indicates that faith in the government's economic competence is damaged.

title: Bruce Willis denies selling rights to his face
description: It was widely reported that the actor had sold his face to a deepfake company.
